## Source: ossf-package-analysis (6e35a9499d5b3efd34a3813328043f5f0132eef5cacc23f14dbaa2ba4e06ce43)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'beautifulsoup-scikit-learn' @ 2.4.9 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:
- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
